description: Where n-th prime appears in Euclid-Mullin sequence A000945.
mathematica: f[1]=2; f[n_] := f[n] = FactorInteger[Product[f[i], {i, 1, n - 1}] + 1][[1, 1]] ems = Table[f[n], {n, 1, 43}]; Do[Print[Position[ems, Prime[n]][[1, 1]]], {n, 1, 25}]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 15 2000
extensions: Two more terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Sep 20 2012
